title: Chalice Cover, late 16th–early 17th century
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Central pattern is a rosette enclosed by symmetrically placed floral and foliated forms. Outer border is in a pattern of running floral and foliated branches.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chalice Cover, late 16th–early 17th century.
late 16th–early 17th century. Medium: linen
Technique: cutwork. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-50-15.
